title: Developing Customized Strategies for Blended Learning Design and Evaluation

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science theories and experience using online learning tools
context.additional_context: A course where learners, composed of professionals, explore and evaluate blended learning models with high workplace relevance.

learning_goals: Learners will derive three or more strategies that consider learning effectiveness (based on Sloan-C standards) when designing blended learning environments
Learners will develop an assessment framework that combines LMS-based asynchronous activities with face-to-face elements
Learners will propose improvements to blended learning models through analysis of learner satisfaction and cost-effectiveness
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
